```java
/**
 * è§„åˆ™æ‰§è¡Œä¼˜åŒ–ç­–ç•¥
 */
@Service
public class RuleExecutionOptimizer {
    
    // è§„åˆ™ç¼–è¯‘ç¼“å­˜
    private final LoadingCache<String, CompiledRule> compiledRuleCache = 
        Caffeine.newBuilder()
            .maximumSize(100)
            .expireAfterWrite(1, TimeUnit.HOURS)
            .recordStats()
            .build(this::compileRule);
    
    // æ•°æ®é¢„å–ç¼“å­˜
    private final Cache<String, Object> dataPrefetchCache = 
        Caffeine.newBuilder()
            .maximumSize(10000)
            .expireAfterWrite(5, TimeUnit.MINUTES)
            .build();
    
    /**
     * é¢„ç¼–è¯‘è§„åˆ™ï¼Œä¼˜åŒ–æ‰§è¡Œæ€§èƒ½
     */
    private CompiledRule compileRule(String ruleCode) {
        long startTime = System.currentTimeMillis();
        
        // 1. è§£æåŸå§‹è§„åˆ™
        RuleDefinition definition = loadRuleDefinition(ruleCode);
        
        // 2. è½¬æ¢ä¸ºæ‰§è¡Œè®¡åˆ’
        ExecutionPlan plan = optimizeExecutionPlan(definition);
        
        // 3. é¢„ç¼–è¯‘è¡¨è¾¾å¼
        Map<String, CompiledExpression> compiledExpressions = 
            precompileExpressions(definition);
        
        // 4. ç”Ÿæˆå­—èŠ‚ç ï¼ˆå¯é€‰ï¼Œç”¨äºæé«˜æ€§èƒ½è¦æ±‚ï¼‰
        if (definition.isPerformanceCritical()) {
            byte[] bytecode = generateBytecode(definition);
        }
        
        CompiledRule compiledRule = new CompiledRule(definition, plan, compiledExpressions);
        
        log.info("è§„åˆ™ç¼–è¯‘å®Œæˆ: {}, è€—æ—¶: {}ms", ruleCode, System.currentTimeMillis() - startTime);
        
        return compiledRule;
    }
    
    /**
     * æ™ºèƒ½æ•°æ®é¢„å–
     */
    public void intelligentDataPrefetch(String ruleCode, Long supplierId) {
        CompiledRule compiledRule = compiledRuleCache.get(ruleCode);
        
        // åˆ†ææ•°æ®éœ€æ±‚
        Set<DataSourceConfig> requiredDataSources = compiledRule.getRequiredDataSources();
        
        // å¹¶è¡Œé¢„å–æ•°æ®
        List<CompletableFuture<DataFetchResult>> futures = requiredDataSources.stream()
            .filter(this::shouldPrefetch)
            .map(ds -> CompletableFuture.supplyAsync(() -> 
                prefetchDataSource(ds, supplierId), prefetchExecutor))
            .collect(Collectors.toList());
        
        // ä¸ç­‰å¾…ç»“æœï¼Œå¼‚æ­¥å¡«å……ç¼“å­˜
        CompletableFuture.allOf(futures.toArray(new CompletableFuture[0]))
            .thenAccept(v -> {
                futures.forEach(future -> {
                    try {
                        DataFetchResult result = future.get();
                        dataPrefetchCache.put(buildCacheKey(ds, supplierId), result.getData());
                    } catch (Exception e) {
                        // å¿½ç•¥é¢„å–å¤±è´¥ï¼Œåç»­ä¼šå®æ—¶è·å–
                    }
                });
            });
    }
    
    /**
     * è§„åˆ™æ‰§è¡Œæ‰¹é‡åŒ–
     */
    public BatchEvaluationResult batchEvaluateSuppliers(List<Long> supplierIds, String ruleCode) {
        // 1. æ‰¹é‡è·å–è§„åˆ™
        CompiledRule compiledRule = compiledRuleCache.get(ruleCode);
        
        // 2. æ‰¹é‡è·å–æ•°æ®ï¼ˆå‡å°‘IOæ¬¡æ•°ï¼‰
        Map<Long, Map<String, Object>> batchData = batchFetchData(supplierIds, compiledRule);
        
        // 3. å¹¶è¡Œæ‰§è¡Œè¯„ä¼°
        List<CompletableFuture<EvaluationResult>> futures = supplierIds.stream()
            .map(supplierId -> CompletableFuture.supplyAsync(() -> 
                evaluateSingleSupplier(compiledRule, supplierId, batchData.get(supplierId)), 
                batchEvaluationExecutor))
            .collect(Collectors.toList());
        
        // 4. æ”¶é›†ç»“æœ
        List<EvaluationResult> results = futures.stream()
            .map(CompletableFuture::join)
            .collect(Collectors.toList());
        
        // 5. ç”Ÿæˆæ‰¹é‡æŠ¥å‘Š
        BatchEvaluationResult batchResult = aggregateBatchResults(results);
        
        return batchResult;
    }
}
```

```java
@Service
@Slf4j
public class FinancialSystemIntegrationService {
    
    @Autowired
    private FinancialSystemClient financialClient;
    
    @Autowired
    private CircuitBreakerFactory circuitBreakerFactory;
    
    /**
     * å®æ—¶è·å–ä¾›åº”å•†åº”ä»˜è´¦æ¬¾ä¿¡æ¯
     * ä¸šåŠ¡åœºæ™¯ï¼šä¾›åº”å•†è¯„ä¼°æ—¶ï¼Œéœ€è¦æœ€æ–°çš„è´¢åŠ¡ä»˜æ¬¾è®°å½•
     */
    @Retryable(value = {FeignException.class}, maxAttempts = 3, backoff = @Backoff(delay = 1000))
    public PaymentStatus getSupplierPaymentStatus(Long supplierId) {
        CircuitBreaker circuitBreaker = circuitBreakerFactory.create("financial-api");
        
        return circuitBreaker.run(() -> {
            // 1. è°ƒç”¨è´¢åŠ¡ç³»ç»ŸAPI
            PaymentStatusResponse response = financialClient.getPaymentStatus(
                supplierId, 
                LocalDate.now().minusMonths(6), // æœ€è¿‘6ä¸ªæœˆæ•°æ®
                LocalDate.now()
            );
            
            // 2. æ•°æ®è½¬æ¢å’Œæ ¡éªŒ
            PaymentStatus status = convertPaymentResponse(response);
            validatePaymentData(status);
            
            // 3. è®°å½•åŒæ­¥æ—¥å¿—
            logSyncOperation("payment_status", supplierId, OperationType.REAL_TIME);
            
            return status;
            
        }, throwable -> {
            // é™çº§ç­–ç•¥ï¼šä»æœ¬åœ°ç¼“å­˜è·å–å†å²æ•°æ®
            log.warn("è´¢åŠ¡ç³»ç»Ÿè°ƒç”¨å¤±è´¥ï¼Œä½¿ç”¨é™çº§æ•°æ®ï¼ŒsupplierId: {}", supplierId, throwable);
            return getPaymentStatusFromCache(supplierId);
        });
    }
    
    /**
     * æ‰¹é‡åŒæ­¥ä»˜æ¬¾çŠ¶æ€ï¼ˆå®šæ—¶ä»»åŠ¡ï¼‰
     */
    @Scheduled(cron = "0 0 2 * * ?") // æ¯å¤©å‡Œæ™¨2ç‚¹æ‰§è¡Œ
    @Async("financialSyncExecutor")
    public void batchSyncPaymentStatus() {
        log.info("å¼€å§‹æ‰¹é‡åŒæ­¥ä¾›åº”å•†ä»˜æ¬¾çŠ¶æ€");
        
        // 1. è·å–éœ€è¦åŒæ­¥çš„ä¾›åº”å•†åˆ—è¡¨ï¼ˆæœ€è¿‘30å¤©æœ‰äº¤æ˜“çš„ï¼‰
        List<Long> activeSupplierIds = supplierService.getActiveSupplierIds(30);
        
        // 2. åˆ†æ‰¹å¤„ç†ï¼Œæ¯æ‰¹100ä¸ª
        Lists.partition(activeSupplierIds, 100).forEach(batch -> {
            CompletableFuture.allOf(
                batch.stream()
                    .map(this::asyncSyncSingleSupplierPayment)
                    .toArray(CompletableFuture[]::new)
            ).join();
            
            log.info("æ‰¹æ¬¡åŒæ­¥å®Œæˆï¼Œä¾›åº”å•†æ•°é‡: {}", batch.size());
        });
    }
    
    private CompletableFuture<Void> asyncSyncSingleSupplierPayment(Long supplierId) {
        return CompletableFuture.runAsync(() -> {
            try {
                PaymentStatus status = getSupplierPaymentStatus(supplierId);
                paymentStatusRepository.save(status);
                
                // å‘å¸ƒäº‹ä»¶ï¼Œé€šçŸ¥å…¶ä»–æœåŠ¡
                eventPublisher.publishEvent(new PaymentStatusUpdatedEvent(status));
                
            } catch (Exception e) {
                log.error("åŒæ­¥ä¾›åº”å•†ä»˜æ¬¾çŠ¶æ€å¤±è´¥ï¼ŒsupplierId: {}", supplierId, e);
                failedSyncService.recordFailure(supplierId, "payment_status", e.getMessage());
            }
        }, financialSyncExecutor);
    }
}
```

###### 2.2 å¼‚æ­¥æ•°æ®é›†æˆï¼ˆæ¶ˆæ¯é˜Ÿåˆ—ï¼‰

```java
/**
 * è´¨é‡ç³»ç»Ÿé€šè¿‡RabbitMQæ¨é€æ£€éªŒç»“æœ
 * ä½¿ç”¨å‘å¸ƒ-è®¢é˜…æ¨¡å¼

@Component
@Slf4j
public class QualitySystemMessageListener {
    
    @Autowired
    private SupplierAssessmentService assessmentService;
    
    @Autowired
    private QualityDataRepository qualityDataRepository;
    
    @Autowired
    private MetricRegistry metricRegistry;
    
    /**
     * ç›‘å¬è´¨é‡æ£€éªŒç»“æœæ¶ˆæ¯
     * æ¶ˆæ¯æ ¼å¼ï¼šJSON
     */
    @RabbitListener(
        queues = "${rabbitmq.queue.quality.inspection}",
        concurrency = "3-5", // åŠ¨æ€å¹¶å‘
        containerFactory = "jsonMessageContainerFactory"
    )
    @Transactional
    public void handleInspectionResult(QualityInspectionMessage message) {
        long startTime = System.currentTimeMillis();
        
        try {
            log.info("æ”¶åˆ°è´¨é‡æ£€éªŒç»“æœï¼Œæ‰¹æ¬¡å·: {}ï¼Œä¾›åº”å•†: {}", 
                     message.getBatchNumber(), message.getSupplierId());
            
            // 1. æ¶ˆæ¯å»é‡æ£€æŸ¥ï¼ˆå¹‚ç­‰æ€§å¤„ç†ï¼‰
            if (isDuplicateMessage(message.getMessageId())) {
                log.warn("é‡å¤æ¶ˆæ¯ï¼Œè·³è¿‡å¤„ç†ï¼ŒmessageId: {}", message.getMessageId());
                return;
            }
            
            // 2. æ•°æ®éªŒè¯
            validateInspectionMessage(message);
            
            // 3. ä¿å­˜è´¨é‡æ•°æ®
            QualityInspectionRecord record = convertToEntity(message);
            qualityDataRepository.save(record);
            
            // 4. è§¦å‘ä¾›åº”å•†è¯„ä¼°æ›´æ–°
            if (message.isCriticalDefect()) {
                assessmentService.triggerSupplierReassessment(
                    message.getSupplierId(), 
                    AssessmentTrigger.QUALITY_ISSUE
                );
            }
            
            // 5. å‘é€é€šçŸ¥
            eventPublisher.publishEvent(new QualityInspectionCompletedEvent(record));
            
            // 6. ç¡®è®¤æ¶ˆæ¯
            markMessageProcessed(message.getMessageId());
            
            long duration = System.currentTimeMillis() - startTime;
            metricRegistry.timer("quality.message.processing.time").update(duration, TimeUnit.MILLISECONDS);
            
            log.info("è´¨é‡æ£€éªŒç»“æœå¤„ç†å®Œæˆï¼Œè€—æ—¶: {}ms", duration);
            
        } catch (ValidationException e) {
            log.error("è´¨é‡æ¶ˆæ¯éªŒè¯å¤±è´¥: {}", message.getMessageId(), e);
            // è¿›å…¥æ­»ä¿¡é˜Ÿåˆ—
            throw new AmqpRejectAndDontRequeueException(e);
        } catch (Exception e) {
            log.error("å¤„ç†è´¨é‡æ¶ˆæ¯å¤±è´¥: {}", message.getMessageId(), e);
            // è®°å½•å¤±è´¥ï¼Œäººå·¥ä»‹å…¥
            failedMessageService.recordFailure(message, e);
            throw new AmqpRejectAndDontRequeueException(e);
        }
    }
    
    /**
     * æ¶ˆæ¯æ ¼å¼å®šä¹‰
     */
    @Data
    @AllArgsConstructor
    @NoArgsConstructor
    public static class QualityInspectionMessage {
        @JsonProperty("message_id")
        private String messageId;
        
        @JsonProperty("supplier_id")
        private Long supplierId;
        
        @JsonProperty("material_code")
        private String materialCode;
        
        @JsonProperty("batch_number")
        private String batchNumber;
        
        @JsonProperty("inspection_date")
        private LocalDateTime inspectionDate;
        
        @JsonProperty("defect_count")
        private Integer defectCount;
        
        @JsonProperty("total_count")
        private Integer totalCount;
        
        @JsonProperty("defect_rate")
        private BigDecimal defectRate;
        
        @JsonProperty("is_critical_defect")
        private Boolean isCriticalDefect;
        
        @JsonProperty("inspection_result")
        private InspectionResult result; // PASS, FAIL, CONDITIONAL
        
        @JsonProperty("attachments")
        private List<String> attachmentUrls; // æ£€éªŒæŠ¥å‘Šé™„ä»¶
        
        @JsonProperty("metadata")
        private Map<String, Object> metadata;
    }
}
```

###### 2.3 æ–‡ä»¶æ•°æ®äº¤æ¢ï¼ˆFDIé›†æˆï¼‰

**PDTç³»ç»Ÿ - ç‰©æ–™ä¸»æ•°æ®æ–‡ä»¶å¯¼å…¥**

```java
/**
 * PDTç³»ç»Ÿé€šè¿‡FTP/SFTPä¼ è¾“ç‰©æ–™ä¸»æ•°æ®æ–‡ä»¶
 * æ–‡ä»¶æ ¼å¼ï¼šXML/CSV
 */
@Service
@Slf4j
public class PDTMaterialDataImporter {
    
    @Value("${pdt.ftp.host}")
    private String ftpHost;
    
    @Value("${pdt.ftp.port}")
    private int ftpPort;
    
    @Value("${pdt.ftp.username}")
    private String ftpUsername;
    
    @Value("${pdt.ftp.password}")
    private String ftpPassword;
    
    @Value("${pdt.ftp.directory.inbound}")
    private String inboundDirectory;
    
    @Autowired
    private MaterialDataProcessor materialProcessor;
    
    @Autowired
    private FileValidationService validationService;
    
    /**
     * å®šæ—¶ä»FTPæ‹‰å–ç‰©æ–™æ•°æ®æ–‡ä»¶
     */
    @Scheduled(cron = "0 */30 * * * ?") // æ¯30åˆ†é’Ÿæ‰§è¡Œä¸€æ¬¡
    public void fetchAndProcessMaterialFiles() {
        log.info("å¼€å§‹ä»PDTç³»ç»Ÿæ‹‰å–ç‰©æ–™æ•°æ®æ–‡ä»¶");
        
        try (FTPSClient ftpClient = new FTPSClient()) {
            // 1. è¿æ¥FTPæœåŠ¡å™¨
            ftpClient.connect(ftpHost, ftpPort);
            ftpClient.login(ftpUsername, ftpPassword);
            ftpClient.enterLocalPassiveMode();
            
            // 2. åˆ‡æ¢åˆ°å…¥ç«™ç›®å½•
            ftpClient.changeWorkingDirectory(inboundDirectory);
            
            // 3. åˆ—å‡ºæ‰€æœ‰å¾…å¤„ç†æ–‡ä»¶ï¼ˆæŒ‰æ–‡ä»¶åæ’åºï¼‰
            FTPFile[] files = ftpClient.listFiles("MATERIAL_DATA_*.csv");
            Arrays.sort(files, Comparator.comparing(FTPFile::getTimestamp));
            
            for (FTPFile file : files) {
                if (file.isFile()) {
                    processSingleFile(ftpClient, file);
                }
            }
            
        } catch (Exception e) {
            log.error("FTPè¿æ¥æˆ–æ–‡ä»¶å¤„ç†å¤±è´¥", e);
            alertService.sendAlert("PDTæ–‡ä»¶åŒæ­¥å¤±è´¥", e.getMessage());
        }
    }
    
    private void processSingleFile(FTPSClient ftpClient, FTPFile file) {
        String filename = file.getName();
        String tempFilePath = "/tmp/" + filename;
        String archivePath = inboundDirectory + "/archive/" + filename;
        
        try {
            // 1. ä¸‹è½½æ–‡ä»¶åˆ°æœ¬åœ°
            try (OutputStream outputStream = new FileOutputStream(tempFilePath)) {
                ftpClient.retrieveFile(filename, outputStream);
            }
            
            log.info("æ–‡ä»¶ä¸‹è½½å®Œæˆ: {}ï¼Œå¤§å°: {} bytes", filename, file.getSize());
            
            // 2. æ–‡ä»¶æ ¡éªŒï¼ˆæ ¼å¼ã€å®Œæ•´æ€§ï¼‰
            ValidationResult validation = validationService.validateMaterialFile(tempFilePath);
            if (!validation.isValid()) {
                log.error("æ–‡ä»¶æ ¡éªŒå¤±è´¥: {}ï¼ŒåŸå› : {}", filename, validation.getErrorMessage());
                moveToErrorDirectory(ftpClient, filename);
                return;
            }
            
            // 3. å¤„ç†æ–‡ä»¶å†…å®¹
            MaterialImportResult result = materialProcessor.processFile(tempFilePath);
            
            // 4. è®°å½•å¤„ç†æ—¥å¿—
            logImportResult(filename, result);
            
            // 5. æ–‡ä»¶å½’æ¡£
            ftpClient.rename(filename, archivePath);
            
            // 6. åˆ é™¤æœ¬åœ°ä¸´æ—¶æ–‡ä»¶
            Files.deleteIfExists(Paths.get(tempFilePath));
            
            log.info("æ–‡ä»¶å¤„ç†å®Œæˆ: {}ï¼ŒæˆåŠŸ: {}ï¼Œå¤±è´¥: {}", 
                     filename, result.getSuccessCount(), result.getFailedCount());
            
        } catch (Exception e) {
            log.error("å¤„ç†æ–‡ä»¶å¤±è´¥: {}", filename, e);
            moveToErrorDirectory(ftpClient, filename);
        }
    }
    
    /**
     * ç‰©æ–™æ•°æ®å¤„ç†å™¨
     */
    @Service
    public class MaterialDataProcessor {
        
        @Autowired
        private MaterialRepository materialRepository;
        
        @Autowired
        private MaterialCategoryRepository categoryRepository;
        
        public MaterialImportResult processFile(String filePath) {
            MaterialImportResult result = new MaterialImportResult();
            
            try (BufferedReader reader = Files.newBufferedReader(Paths.get(filePath), 
                                                                StandardCharsets.UTF_8)) {
                // ä½¿ç”¨CSVè§£æå™¨
                CSVParser parser = new CSVParser(reader, 
                    CSVFormat.DEFAULT
                        .withHeader()
                        .withSkipHeaderRecord()
                        .withIgnoreEmptyLines()
                        .withTrim());
                
                // åˆ†æ‰¹å¤„ç†ï¼Œæ¯100æ¡æäº¤ä¸€æ¬¡
                List<Material> batch = new ArrayList<>(100);
                
                for (CSVRecord record : parser) {
                    try {
                        Material material = parseMaterialRecord(record);
                        
                        // æ•°æ®æ ¡éªŒ
                        validateMaterial(material);
                        
                        batch.add(material);
                        
                        // æ‰¹æ¬¡æäº¤
                        if (batch.size() >= 100) {
                            saveBatch(batch);
                            result.incrementSuccess(batch.size());
                            batch.clear();
                        }
                        
                    } catch (DataValidationException e) {
                        result.addFailedRecord(record.getRecordNumber(), 
                                              record.toMap(), 
                                              e.getMessage());
                    }
                }
                
                // æäº¤å‰©ä½™è®°å½•
                if (!batch.isEmpty()) {
                    saveBatch(batch);
                    result.incrementSuccess(batch.size());
                }
                
            } catch (Exception e) {
                log.error("è§£æç‰©æ–™æ–‡ä»¶å¤±è´¥", e);
                result.setGlobalError(e.getMessage());
            }
            
            return result;
        }
        
        @Transactional(propagation = Propagation.REQUIRES_NEW)
        public void saveBatch(List<Material> materials) {
            materialRepository.saveAll(materials);
            
            // å‘å¸ƒç‰©æ–™å˜æ›´äº‹ä»¶
            materials.forEach(material -> 
                eventPublisher.publishEvent(new MaterialImportedEvent(material))
            );
        }
    }
}
```

```java
@RestController
@RequestMapping("/api/v1/suppliers")
@Validated
@Slf4j
public class SupplierApiController {
    
    @Autowired
    private SupplierQueryService supplierService;
    
    @Autowired
    private ApiRateLimiter rateLimiter;
    
    @Autowired
    private ApiAuditService auditService;
    
    /**
     * è·å–ä¾›åº”å•†è¯¦æƒ… - æ”¯æŒå­—æ®µæŠ•å½±å’Œæ‰©å±•
     */
    @GetMapping("/{supplierId}")
    @ApiOperation("è·å–ä¾›åº”å•†è¯¦ç»†ä¿¡æ¯")
    @PreAuthorize("@apiSecurity.checkAccess('SUPPLIER_READ', #supplierId)")
    public ResponseEntity<ApiResponse<SupplierDetailDTO>> getSupplierDetail(
            @PathVariable Long supplierId,
            @RequestParam(required = false) String fields,
            @RequestParam(required = false, defaultValue = "false") boolean includeRelated,
            @RequestParam(required = false) List<String> expand) {
        
        // 1. APIè°ƒç”¨é™æµ
        if (!rateLimiter.tryAcquire("supplier_detail")) {
            throw new RateLimitExceededException("APIè°ƒç”¨é¢‘ç‡è¶…é™");
        }
        
        long startTime = System.currentTimeMillis();
        
        try {
            // 2. æ„å»ºæŸ¥è¯¢å‚æ•°
            SupplierQueryParams params = SupplierQueryParams.builder()
                .supplierId(supplierId)
                .fields(parseFields(fields))
                .includeRelated(includeRelated)
                .expandFields(expand)
                .build();
            
            // 3. æ‰§è¡ŒæŸ¥è¯¢
            SupplierDetailDTO detail = supplierService.getSupplierDetail(params);
            
            // 4. æ•°æ®è„±æ•å¤„ç†
            applyDataMasking(detail);
            
            // 5. è®°å½•å®¡è®¡æ—¥å¿—
            auditService.logApiAccess("GET /api/v1/suppliers/" + supplierId, 
                                     ApiAccessStatus.SUCCESS);
            
            long duration = System.currentTimeMillis() - startTime;
            log.info("ä¾›åº”å•†è¯¦æƒ…APIè°ƒç”¨å®Œæˆï¼ŒsupplierId: {}ï¼Œè€—æ—¶: {}ms", supplierId, duration);
            
            // 6. è¿”å›å“åº”ï¼ˆæ”¯æŒETagç¼“å­˜ï¼‰
            return ResponseEntity.ok()
                .eTag(detail.getVersion().toString())
                .cacheControl(CacheControl.maxAge(60, TimeUnit.SECONDS))
                .body(ApiResponse.success(detail));
                
        } catch (SupplierNotFoundException e) {
            auditService.logApiAccess("GET /api/v1/suppliers/" + supplierId, 
                                     ApiAccessStatus.NOT_FOUND);
            throw e;
        } catch (Exception e) {
            auditService.logApiAccess("GET /api/v1/suppliers/" + supplierId, 
                                     ApiAccessStatus.ERROR);
            throw new ApiException("æŸ¥è¯¢ä¾›åº”å•†ä¿¡æ¯å¤±è´¥", e);
        }
    }
    
    /**
     * æ‰¹é‡æŸ¥è¯¢ä¾›åº”å•† - æ”¯æŒå¤æ‚è¿‡æ»¤å’Œåˆ†é¡µ
     */
    @PostMapping("/batch-query")
    @ApiOperation("æ‰¹é‡æŸ¥è¯¢ä¾›åº”å•†ä¿¡æ¯")
    @PreAuthorize("@apiSecurity.checkAccess('SUPPLIER_BATCH_READ')")
    public ResponseEntity<ApiResponse<PageResult<SupplierSummaryDTO>>> batchQuerySuppliers(
            @Valid @RequestBody SupplierBatchQueryRequest request,
            @RequestParam(required = false, defaultValue = "0") int page,
            @RequestParam(required = false, defaultValue = "50") int size) {
        
        // 1. å‚æ•°æ ¡éªŒ
        if (request.getSupplierIds() != null && request.getSupplierIds().size() > 1000) {
            throw new ValidationException("æ‰¹é‡æŸ¥è¯¢æ•°é‡ä¸èƒ½è¶…è¿‡1000æ¡");
        }
        
        // 2. æ‰§è¡Œæ‰¹é‡æŸ¥è¯¢ï¼ˆå¹¶è¡Œå¤„ç†ï¼‰

        // 3. è¿”å›åˆ†é¡µç»“æœ
        return ResponseEntity.ok(ApiResponse.success(result));
    }
    
    /**

        // å®æ—¶è·å–ä¾›åº”å•†çŠ¶æ€å˜åŒ–

        // æ¨é€åˆ°è®¢é˜…çš„ä¸‹æ¸¸ç³»ç»Ÿ

/**

@Configuration
public class ApiGatewayConfig {
    
    @Bean
    public RouteLocator customRouteLocator(RouteLocatorBuilder builder) {
        return builder.routes()
            .route("supplier-api", r -> r
                .path("/api/v1/suppliers/**")
                .filters(f -> f
                    .addRequestHeader("X-Request-Id", UUID.randomUUID().toString())
                    .addResponseHeader("X-Response-Time", LocalDateTime.now().toString())
                    .circuitBreaker(config -> config
                        .setName("supplierService")
                        .setFallbackUri("forward:/fallback/supplier"))
                    .requestRateLimiter(config -> config
                        .setRateLimiter(redisRateLimiter())
                        .setKeyResolver(exchange -> 
                            Mono.just(exchange.getRequest().getRemoteAddress().getAddress().getHostAddress()))
                    )
                )
                .uri("lb://procurement-supplier-service"))
            .build();
    }
}
```

```java
@Component

public class SupplierEventPublisher {
    
    @Autowired
    private ApplicationEventPublisher eventPublisher;
    
    @Autowired
    private RabbitTemplate rabbitTemplate;
    
    @Autowired
    private EventBus eventBus;
    
    /**

    @TransactionalEventListener(phase = TransactionPhase.AFTER_COMMIT)
    public void publishSupplierStatusChange(SupplierStatusChangedEvent event) {

        log.info("å‘å¸ƒä¾›åº”å•†çŠ¶æ€å˜æ›´äº‹ä»¶ï¼ŒsupplierId: {}ï¼ŒçŠ¶æ€: {} -> {}", 
                 supplier.getId(), event.getOldStatus(), supplier.getStatus());
        
        // 1. Spring ApplicationEventï¼ˆåŒæ­¥ï¼Œæœ¬åœ°ç›‘å¬ï¼‰
        eventPublisher.publishEvent(event);

                m.getMessageProperties().setHeader("supplier_id", supplier.getId().toString());
                m.getMessageProperties().setPriority(getMessagePriority(supplier));
                return m;

        // 3. æœ¬åœ°EventBusï¼ˆå¼‚æ­¥ï¼Œè·¨æ¨¡å—ï¼‰
        eventBus.post(new InternalSupplierEvent(event));
        
        // 4. WebSocketå®æ—¶æ¨é€
        webSocketService.broadcast(

            new SupplierUpdateDTO(supplier)

        // 5. è®°å½•äº‹ä»¶å‘å¸ƒæ—¥å¿—
        eventLogService.logEventPublished(event);
    }

    public class ContractSystemEventListener {
        
        @RabbitListener(queues = "${rabbitmq.queue.contract.supplier.status}")
        @Transactional
        public void handleSupplierStatusChange(SupplierStatusMessage message) {
            log.info("åˆåŒç³»ç»Ÿæ”¶åˆ°ä¾›åº”å•†çŠ¶æ€å˜æ›´ï¼ŒsupplierId: {}ï¼Œæ–°çŠ¶æ€: {}", 
                     message.getSupplierId(), message.getNewStatus());
            
            try {
                // 1. æ›´æ–°åˆåŒç³»ç»Ÿä¸­çš„ä¾›åº”å•†çŠ¶æ€
                contractService.updateSupplierStatus(
                    message.getSupplierId(), 
                    message.getNewStatus()
                );
                
                // 2. æ£€æŸ¥å—å½±å“çš„æœ‰æ•ˆåˆåŒ
                List<Contract> affectedContracts = contractService.findActiveContractsBySupplier(
                    message.getSupplierId()

                // 3. æ ¹æ®æ–°çŠ¶æ€å¤„ç†åˆåŒ
                if (message.getNewStatus() == SupplierStatus.BLACKLISTED) {
                    // ä¾›åº”å•†è¿›å…¥é»‘åå•ï¼Œæš‚åœç›¸å…³åˆåŒ
                    affectedContracts.forEach(contract -> 
                        contractService.suspendContract(contract.getId(), 
                                                       "ä¾›åº”å•†è¿›å…¥é»‘åå•")
                    );
                }

                    message.getSupplierId(),

            } catch (Exception e) {

                // è¿›å…¥é‡è¯•é˜Ÿåˆ—
                throw new AmqpRejectAndDontRequeueException(e);
            }
        }
    }
}
```

```java
/**
```

```java
@Component
@Slf4j
public class InterfaceHealthMonitor {
    
    @Autowired
    private HealthIndicatorRegistry healthRegistry;
    
    @Autowired
    private AlertService alertService;
    
    @Scheduled(fixedRate = 60000) // æ¯åˆ†é’Ÿæ£€æŸ¥ä¸€æ¬¡
    public void monitorAllInterfaces() {
        Map<String, InterfaceHealth> healthStatus = new HashMap<>();
        
        // ç›‘æ§æ‰€æœ‰ä¸Šæ¸¸æ¥å£
        monitorUpstreamInterfaces(healthStatus);
        
        // ç›‘æ§æ‰€æœ‰ä¸‹æ¸¸æ¥å£
        monitorDownstreamInterfaces(healthStatus);
        
        // ç”Ÿæˆå¥åº·æŠ¥å‘Š
        HealthReport report = generateHealthReport(healthStatus);
        
        // å‘é€å‘Šè­¦
        if (report.hasCriticalIssues()) {
            alertService.sendAlert("æ¥å£å¥åº·çŠ¶æ€å¼‚å¸¸", report.getSummary());
        }
        
        // æ›´æ–°ä»ªè¡¨ç›˜
        updateDashboard(report);
    }
    
    private void monitorUpstreamInterfaces(Map<String, InterfaceHealth> healthStatus) {
        // è´¢åŠ¡ç³»ç»Ÿæ¥å£
        healthStatus.put("financial_api", checkFinancialInterface());
        
        // è´¨é‡ç³»ç»Ÿæ¥å£
        healthStatus.put("quality_mq", checkQualityMessageQueue());
        
        // PDTç³»ç»Ÿæ–‡ä»¶æ¥å£
        healthStatus.put("pdt_ftp", checkPDTFtpInterface());
    }
    
    private InterfaceHealth checkFinancialInterface() {
        try {
            long startTime = System.currentTimeMillis();
            
            // 1. æµ‹è¯•è¿é€šæ€§
            HealthResponse health = financialClient.healthCheck();
            
            // 2. æµ‹è¯•åŠŸèƒ½æ¥å£
            PaymentStatus testResponse = financialClient.getPaymentStatus(
                1L, // æµ‹è¯•ç”¨ä¾›åº”å•†ID
                LocalDate.now().minusDays(1),
                LocalDate.now()
            );
            
            long responseTime = System.currentTimeMillis() - startTime;
            
            return InterfaceHealth.builder()
                .status(HealthStatus.UP)
                .responseTime(responseTime)
                .lastCheck(LocalDateTime.now())
                .details(Map.of(
                    "version", health.getVersion(),
                    "test_success", testResponse != null
                ))
                .build();
                
        } catch (Exception e) {
            return InterfaceHealth.builder()
                .status(HealthStatus.DOWN)
                .errorMessage(e.getMessage())
                .lastCheck(LocalDateTime.now())
                .build();
        }
    }
}

/**
 * æ¥å£è°ƒç”¨ç»Ÿè®¡å’Œæ€§èƒ½ç›‘æ§

@Aspect
@Component
@Slf4j
public class InterfaceMonitorAspect {
    
    @Autowired
    private MeterRegistry meterRegistry;
    
    @Around("@within(org.springframework.web.bind.annotation.RestController) || " +
            "@within(javax.jws.WebService)")
    public Object monitorInterfaceCall(ProceedingJoinPoint joinPoint) throws Throwable {
        String interfaceName = joinPoint.getSignature().toShortString();
        long startTime = System.currentTimeMillis();
        
        Timer.Sample sample = Timer.start(meterRegistry);
        
        try {
            Object result = joinPoint.proceed();
            
            long duration = System.currentTimeMillis() - startTime;
            
            // è®°å½•æˆåŠŸæŒ‡æ ‡
            sample.stop(meterRegistry.timer("api.call.duration", 
                                           "interface", interfaceName,
                                           "status", "success"));
            
            meterRegistry.counter("api.call.count", 
                                 "interface", interfaceName,
                                 "status", "success").increment();
            
            // æ…¢æ¥å£å‘Šè­¦
            if (duration > 1000) { // è¶…è¿‡1ç§’
                log.warn("æ¥å£å“åº”ç¼“æ…¢ï¼Œæ¥å£: {}ï¼Œè€—æ—¶: {}ms", interfaceName, duration);
                slowInterfaceAlert(interfaceName, duration);
            }
            
            return result;
            
        } catch (Exception e) {
            long duration = System.currentTimeMillis() - startTime;
            
            // è®°å½•å¤±è´¥æŒ‡æ ‡
            sample.stop(meterRegistry.timer("api.call.duration", 
                                           "interface", interfaceName,
                                           "status", "error"));
            
            meterRegistry.counter("api.call.count", 
                                 "interface", interfaceName,
                                 "status", "error").increment();
            
            // é”™è¯¯ç‡ç›‘æ§
            checkErrorRate(interfaceName);
            
            throw e;
        }
    }
}
```

###### 5.2 æ•°æ®åŒæ­¥è´¨é‡ç›‘æ§

```sql
-- æ•°æ®åŒæ­¥è´¨é‡ç›‘æ§è§†å›¾
CREATE VIEW data_sync_quality_monitor AS
SELECT 
    -- åŒæ­¥ä»»åŠ¡åŸºæœ¬ä¿¡æ¯
    sync_task.task_name,
    sync_task.source_system,
    sync_task.target_system,
    sync_task.sync_type, -- 'real-time', 'batch', 'file'
    
    -- åŒæ­¥ç»Ÿè®¡
    COALESCE(stats.success_count, 0) as success_count,
    COALESCE(stats.failure_count, 0) as failure_count,
    COALESCE(stats.pending_count, 0) as pending_count,
    
    -- æˆåŠŸç‡è®¡ç®—
    CASE 
        WHEN COALESCE(stats.success_count, 0) + COALESCE(stats.failure_count, 0) = 0 
        THEN 100.0
        ELSE ROUND(
            COALESCE(stats.success_count, 0) * 100.0 / 
            (COALESCE(stats.success_count, 0) + COALESCE(stats.failure_count, 0)), 
            2
        )
    END as success_rate,
    
    -- å»¶è¿Ÿç›‘æ§
    TIMESTAMPDIFF(SECOND, sync_task.last_sync_time, NOW()) as seconds_since_last_sync,
    
    -- æ•°æ®ä¸€è‡´æ€§æ£€æŸ¥
    (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM data_consistency_check 
     WHERE task_id = sync_task.id AND status = 'INCONSISTENT') as inconsistency_count,
    
    -- å‘Šè­¦çŠ¶æ€
    CASE 
        WHEN TIMESTAMPDIFF(MINUTE, sync_task.last_success_time, NOW()) > 30 
        THEN 'CRITICAL'
        WHEN success_rate < 95.0 
        THEN 'WARNING'
        ELSE 'HEALTHY'
    END as alert_status
    
FROM data_sync_task sync_task
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT 
        task_id,
        COUNT(CASE WHEN status = 'SUCCESS' THEN 1 END) as success_count,
        COUNT(CASE WHEN status = 'FAILED' THEN 1 END) as failure_count,
        COUNT(CASE WHEN status = 'PENDING' THEN 1 END) as pending_count
    FROM data_sync_record
    WHERE sync_time > NOW() - INTERVAL 1 HOUR
    GROUP BY task_id
) stats ON sync_task.id = stats.task_id
ORDER BY alert_status DESC, success_rate ASC;
```

```java
        List<DailyMetric> history = metricCollector.getLast90DaysMetrics();
        
        // ä½¿ç”¨çº¿æ€§å›å½’é¢„æµ‹
        Map<String, Double> growthRates = calculateGrowthRates(history);
        
        return CapacityPlan.builder()
            .expectedQps((int)(history.getLast().getQps() * (1 + growthRates.get("qps"))))
            .expectedDataSize((long)(history.getLast().getDataSize() * (1 + growthRates.get("data"))))
            .recommendedInstanceCount(calculateInstanceCount())
            .recommendedDatabaseShards(calculateShardCount())
            .build();
    }
    
    /**
     * åŸºäºLittle's Lawè®¡ç®—æ‰€éœ€å®ä¾‹æ•°
     * L = Î»W (ç³»ç»Ÿå¹³å‡å¹¶å‘æ•° = åˆ°è¾¾ç‡ Ã— å¹³å‡å“åº”æ—¶é—´)
     */
    private int calculateInstanceCount() {
        double arrivalRate = getArrivalRate();      // Î»: è¯·æ±‚åˆ°è¾¾ç‡ (requests/sec)
        double avgResponseTime = getAvgResponseTime(); // W: å¹³å‡å“åº”æ—¶é—´ (seconds)
        double concurrentRequests = arrivalRate * avgResponseTime; // L: å¹¶å‘è¯·æ±‚æ•°
        
        // å‡è®¾å•å®ä¾‹å¤„ç†èƒ½åŠ›
        double instanceCapacity = 500; // å•å®ä¾‹500å¹¶å‘
        
        return (int) Math.ceil(concurrentRequests / instanceCapacity);
    }
}
```

```java
@Component
@Slf4j
public class MultiLevelCacheManager {
    
    // L1: æœ¬åœ°ç¼“å­˜ (Caffeine)
    private final Cache<String, CacheEntry> localCache = Caffeine.newBuilder()
        .maximumSize(10_000)
        .expireAfterWrite(5, TimeUnit.MINUTES)
        .expireAfterAccess(10, TimeUnit.MINUTES)
        .recordStats()  // è®°å½•å‘½ä¸­ç‡ç»Ÿè®¡
        .removalListener((key, value, cause) -> 
            log.debug("æœ¬åœ°ç¼“å­˜ç§»é™¤: key={}, cause={}", key, cause))
        .build();
    
    // L2: Redisé›†ç¾¤ (åˆ†å¸ƒå¼ç¼“å­˜)
    @Autowired
    private RedisTemplate<String, Object> redisTemplate;
    
    // L3: æ•°æ®åº“ (æœ€ç»ˆæ•°æ®æº)
    @Autowired
    private JdbcTemplate jdbcTemplate;
    
    /**
     * ä¸‰çº§ç¼“å­˜æŸ¥è¯¢
     */
    public <T> T getWithCache(String cacheKey, Class<T> type, 
                              Supplier<T> dataLoader, CacheConfig config) {
        long startTime = System.currentTimeMillis();
        
        try {
            // ç¬¬1çº§ï¼šæœ¬åœ°ç¼“å­˜æŸ¥è¯¢
            CacheEntry cached = localCache.getIfPresent(cacheKey);
            if (cached != null && !cached.isExpired()) {
                metricCollector.recordCacheHit("L1");
                return (T) cached.getData();
            }
            
            // ç¬¬2çº§ï¼šåˆ†å¸ƒå¼é”é˜²æ­¢ç¼“å­˜å‡»ç©¿
            String lockKey = "cache_lock:" + cacheKey;
            RLock lock = redissonClient.getLock(lockKey);
            
            try {
                // å°è¯•è·å–é”ï¼Œç­‰å¾…50msï¼Œé”æŒæœ‰200ms
                if (lock.tryLock(50, 200, TimeUnit.MILLISECONDS)) {
                    // ç¬¬2çº§ï¼šRedisç¼“å­˜æŸ¥è¯¢
                    T redisData = (T) redisTemplate.opsForValue().get(buildRedisKey(cacheKey));
                    if (redisData != null) {
                        // å›å¡«æœ¬åœ°ç¼“å­˜
                        localCache.put(cacheKey, new CacheEntry(redisData));
                        metricCollector.recordCacheHit("L2");
                        return redisData;
                    }
                    
                    // ç¬¬3çº§ï¼šæ•°æ®åº“æŸ¥è¯¢
                    T dbData = dataLoader.get();
                    if (dbData != null) {
                        // å¼‚æ­¥åŒå†™ç¼“å­˜ (ä¸é˜»å¡ä¸»æµç¨‹)
                        CompletableFuture.runAsync(() -> {
                            try {
                                // å†™å…¥Redis (è®¾ç½®è¿‡æœŸæ—¶é—´)
                                redisTemplate.opsForValue().set(
                                    buildRedisKey(cacheKey),
                                    dbData,
                                    config.getTtlSeconds(),
                                    TimeUnit.SECONDS
                                );
                                
                                // å†™å…¥æœ¬åœ°ç¼“å­˜
                                localCache.put(cacheKey, new CacheEntry(dbData));
                                
                                log.debug("ç¼“å­˜å›å¡«å®Œæˆ: key={}", cacheKey);
                            } catch (Exception e) {
                                log.error("ç¼“å­˜å›å¡«å¤±è´¥: key={}", cacheKey, e);
                            }
                        }, cacheWriteExecutor);
                    }
                    
                    metricCollector.recordCacheMiss();
                    return dbData;
                } else {
                    // è·å–é”å¤±è´¥ï¼Œè¿”å›é™çº§æ•°æ®
                    metricCollector.recordCacheContention();
                    return getDegradedData(cacheKey, type);
                }
            } finally {
                if (lock.isHeldByCurrentThread()) {
                    lock.unlock();
                }
            }
        } catch (InterruptedException e) {
            Thread.currentThread().interrupt();
            return getDegradedData(cacheKey, type);
        } finally {
            long duration = System.currentTimeMillis() - startTime;
            metricCollector.recordCacheLatency(duration);
        }
    }
    
    /**
     * ç¼“å­˜é¢„çƒ­æœºåˆ¶
     */
    @Scheduled(cron = "0 30 6 * * ?") // æ¯å¤©6:30æ‰§è¡Œé¢„çƒ­
    public void warmUpCache() {
        log.info("å¼€å§‹ç¼“å­˜é¢„çƒ­...");
        
        // è¯†åˆ«çƒ­ç‚¹æ•°æ®
        List<String> hotKeys = identifyHotKeys();
        
        // å¹¶è¡Œé¢„çƒ­
        hotKeys.parallelStream().forEach(key -> {
            try {
                T data = loadDataFromDB(key);
                if (data != null) {
                    // å†™å…¥Redis
                    redisTemplate.opsForValue().set(
                        buildRedisKey(key),
                        data,
                        2, TimeUnit.HOURS
                    );
                    // å†™å…¥æœ¬åœ°ç¼“å­˜
                    localCache.put(key, new CacheEntry(data));
                }
            } catch (Exception e) {
                log.warn("ç¼“å­˜é¢„çƒ­å¤±è´¥: key={}", key, e);
            }
        });
        
        log.info("ç¼“å­˜é¢„çƒ­å®Œæˆï¼Œé¢„çƒ­{}ä¸ªkey", hotKeys.size());
    }
}
```

```java
@Component
@Slf4j
public class SqlOptimizer {
    
    @Autowired
    private DataSource dataSource;
    
    /**
     * è‡ªåŠ¨åˆ†æå¹¶ä¼˜åŒ–æ…¢SQL
     */
    public OptimizedSql optimizeSlowQuery(String originalSql, Object[] params) {
        long startTime = System.currentTimeMillis();
        
        try (Connection conn = dataSource.getConnection()) {
            // 1. è§£æSQLï¼Œæå–è¡¨åã€æ¡ä»¶
            SqlAnalysisResult analysis = analyzeSql(originalSql, params);
            
            // 2. æ£€æŸ¥ç°æœ‰ç´¢å¼•
            List<IndexInfo> existingIndexes = getExistingIndexes(conn, analysis.getTableName());
            
            // 3. ç”Ÿæˆæ‰§è¡Œè®¡åˆ’
            String explainSql = "EXPLAIN " + originalSql;
            List<ExplainResult> explainResults = executeExplain(conn, explainSql, params);
            
            // 4. åˆ†ææ‰§è¡Œè®¡åˆ’é—®é¢˜
            List<OptimizationSuggestion> suggestions = analyzeExplainResult(explainResults);
            
            // 5. ç”Ÿæˆä¼˜åŒ–å»ºè®®
            return generateOptimization(originalSql, analysis, suggestions);
            
        } catch (SQLException e) {
            log.error("SQLä¼˜åŒ–åˆ†æå¤±è´¥", e);
            return OptimizedSql.failed(originalSql, e.getMessage());
        } finally {
            log.info("SQLä¼˜åŒ–åˆ†æè€—æ—¶: {}ms", System.currentTimeMillis() - startTime);
        }
    }
    
    /**
     * ç´¢å¼•æ¨èç®—æ³•
     */
    private IndexRecommendation recommendIndex(String tableName, 
                                              List<String> whereColumns,
                                              List<String> orderColumns,
                                              List<String> selectColumns) {
        // åŸºäºç´¢å¼•é€‰æ‹©åº¦ç®—æ³•
        double selectivity = calculateSelectivity(tableName, whereColumns);
        
        // å¤åˆç´¢å¼•åˆ—é¡ºåºä¼˜åŒ– (é«˜é¢‘æŸ¥è¯¢æ¡ä»¶åœ¨å‰)
        List<String> orderedColumns = optimizeColumnOrder(whereColumns, orderColumns);
        
        // è¦†ç›–ç´¢å¼•åˆ¤æ–­
        boolean isCoveringIndex = selectColumns.stream()
            .allMatch(col -> whereColumns.contains(col) || orderColumns.contains(col));
        
        return IndexRecommendation.builder()
            .tableName(tableName)
            .columnNames(orderedColumns)
            .indexType(isCoveringIndex ? "è¦†ç›–ç´¢å¼•" : "æ™®é€šç´¢å¼•")
            .estimatedImprovement((1 - selectivity) * 100)
            .createSql(generateCreateIndexSql(tableName, orderedColumns))
            .build();
    }
}
```

```java
@Component
public class DynamicSqlBuilder {
    
    /**
     * æ™ºèƒ½SQLæ‹¼æ¥ï¼ˆé¿å…N+1æŸ¥è¯¢ï¼‰
     */
    public String buildSupplierQuery(SupplierQueryCondition condition) {
        StringBuilder sql = new StringBuilder("SELECT ");
        
        // åŠ¨æ€é€‰æ‹©å­—æ®µï¼ˆé¿å…SELECT *ï¼‰
        if (condition.isNeedDetail()) {
            sql.append("s.*, sd.*, sa.* ");
        } else {
            sql.append("s.id, s.name, s.status, s.category ");
        }
        
        sql.append("FROM supplier s ");
        
        // æ™ºèƒ½JOINï¼ˆé¿å…ä¸å¿…è¦çš„å…³è”ï¼‰
        if (condition.isNeedDetail()) {
            sql.append("LEFT JOIN supplier_detail sd ON s.id = sd.supplier_id ");
            sql.append("LEFT JOIN supplier_assessment sa ON s.id = sa.supplier_id ");
        }
        
        // åŠ¨æ€WHEREæ¡ä»¶
        List<String> whereConditions = new ArrayList<>();
        List<Object> params = new ArrayList<>();
        
        if (condition.getCategory() != null) {
            whereConditions.add("s.category = ?");
            params.add(condition.getCategory());
        }
        
        if (condition.getMinScore() != null) {
            whereConditions.add("s.score >= ?");
            params.add(condition.getMinScore());
        }
        
        // æ™ºèƒ½æ·»åŠ ç´¢å¼•æç¤º
        if (whereConditions.contains("s.category")) {
            sql.append("USE INDEX(idx_supplier_category) ");
        }
        
        if (!whereConditions.isEmpty()) {
            sql.append("WHERE ").append(String.join(" AND ", whereConditions));
        }
        
        // æ™ºèƒ½æ’åº
        if (condition.getSortBy() != null) {
            String indexName = getIndexForSort(condition.getSortBy());
            if (indexName != null) {
                sql.append("ORDER BY ").append(condition.getSortBy());
            }
        }
        
        // æ™ºèƒ½åˆ†é¡µï¼ˆé¿å…offsetè¿‡å¤§ï¼‰
        if (condition.getPageSize() > 0) {
            if (condition.getLastId() != null) {
                // ä½¿ç”¨æ¸¸æ ‡åˆ†é¡µï¼ˆåŸºäºIDï¼‰
                sql.append(" AND s.id > ?");
                params.add(condition.getLastId());
                sql.append(" LIMIT ?");
                params.add(condition.getPageSize());
            } else {
                // ä¼ ç»Ÿåˆ†é¡µï¼ˆæ·»åŠ ç´¢å¼•æç¤ºï¼‰
                sql.append(" LIMIT ?, ?");
                params.add(condition.getOffset());
                params.add(condition.getPageSize());
            }
        }
        
        log.debug("ç”Ÿæˆçš„SQL: {}, å‚æ•°: {}", sql, params);
        return sql.toString();
    }
}
```

```java
@Component
@Slf4j
public class ConnectionPoolMonitor {
    
    @Autowired
    private HikariDataSource dataSource;
    
    @Scheduled(fixedDelay = 60000) // æ¯åˆ†é’Ÿç›‘æ§ä¸€æ¬¡
    public void monitorAndAdjust() {
        HikariPoolMXBean pool = dataSource.getHikariPoolMXBean();
        
        // æ”¶é›†æŒ‡æ ‡
        int activeConnections = pool.getActiveConnections();
        int idleConnections = pool.getIdleConnections();
        int totalConnections = pool.getTotalConnections();
        int threadsAwaitingConnection = pool.getThreadsAwaitingConnection();
        
        // è®°å½•åˆ°ç›‘æ§ç³»ç»Ÿ
        metricCollector.recordConnectionPoolMetrics(
            activeConnections, idleConnections, totalConnections, threadsAwaitingConnection);
        
        // è‡ªåŠ¨è°ƒæ•´ç­–ç•¥
        if (threadsAwaitingConnection > 10) {
            // ç­‰å¾…è¿æ¥çš„çº¿ç¨‹è¿‡å¤šï¼Œè€ƒè™‘æ‰©å®¹
            log.warn("è¿æ¥æ± ç­‰å¾…çº¿ç¨‹è¿‡å¤š: {}", threadsAwaitingConnection);
            suggestPoolSizeIncrease();
        }
        
        if (idleConnections > totalConnections * 0.8) {
            // ç©ºé—²è¿æ¥è¿‡å¤šï¼Œè€ƒè™‘ç¼©å®¹
            log.info("è¿æ¥æ± ç©ºé—²è¿æ¥è¿‡å¤šï¼Œè€ƒè™‘ç¼©å®¹");
            suggestPoolSizeDecrease();
        }
        
        // æ£€æŸ¥è¿æ¥æ³„æ¼
        checkConnectionLeak(pool);
    }
    
    /**
     * è¿æ¥æ³„æ¼æ£€æµ‹
     */
    private void checkConnectionLeak(HikariPoolMXBean pool) {
        long leakDetectionThreshold = dataSource.getLeakDetectionThreshold();
        
        if (leakDetectionThreshold > 0) {
            // è®°å½•å¯èƒ½çš„æ³„æ¼
            List<String> potentialLeaks = pool.getPoolPendingConnectionStrings();
            if (!potentialLeaks.isEmpty()) {
                log.error("æ£€æµ‹åˆ°å¯èƒ½çš„è¿æ¥æ³„æ¼: {}", potentialLeaks);
                alertService.sendAlert("æ•°æ®åº“è¿æ¥æ³„æ¼è­¦å‘Š", potentialLeaks.toString());
            }
        }
    }
}
```

```java
@Configuration
public class ThreadPoolConfiguration {
    
    /**
     * æ ¸å¿ƒä¸šåŠ¡çº¿ç¨‹æ± ï¼ˆå¿«é€Ÿå“åº”ï¼‰
     * é€‚ç”¨åœºæ™¯ï¼šæƒé™éªŒè¯ã€ä¾›åº”å•†ä¿¡æ¯æŸ¥è¯¢ç­‰å…³é”®è·¯å¾„
     */
    @Bean("coreBusinessExecutor")
    public ThreadPoolTaskExecutor coreBusinessExecutor() {
        ThreadPoolTaskExecutor executor = new ThreadPoolTaskExecutor();
        
        // CPUæ ¸å¿ƒæ•°ä¸ºåŸºç¡€
        int cpuCores = Runtime.getRuntime().availableProcessors();
        
        executor.setCorePoolSize(cpuCores * 2);      // CPUå¯†é›†å‹ï¼š2N
        executor.setMaxPoolSize(cpuCores * 4);       // æœ€å¤§4N
        executor.setQueueCapacity(1000);             // æœ‰ç•Œé˜Ÿåˆ—ï¼Œé¿å…å†…å­˜æº¢å‡º
        executor.setThreadNamePrefix("core-business-");
        executor.setRejectedExecutionHandler(new ThreadPoolExecutor.CallerRunsPolicy()); // é™çº§ç­–ç•¥
        
        // ä¼˜åŒ–çº¿ç¨‹é…ç½®
        executor.setAllowCoreThreadTimeOut(true);    // æ ¸å¿ƒçº¿ç¨‹å¯è¶…æ—¶å›æ”¶
        executor.setKeepAliveSeconds(60);            // ç©ºé—²çº¿ç¨‹60ç§’å›æ”¶
        executor.setWaitForTasksToCompleteOnShutdown(true); // ä¼˜é›…å…³é—­
        executor.setAwaitTerminationSeconds(30);
        
        executor.initialize();
        
        // æ³¨å†Œç›‘æ§
        monitorThreadPool(executor, "core-business");
        
        return executor;
    }
    
    /**
     * æ‰¹é‡å¤„ç†çº¿ç¨‹æ± ï¼ˆå…è®¸å †ç§¯ï¼‰
     * é€‚ç”¨åœºæ™¯ï¼šæ•°æ®å¯¼å…¥ã€æŠ¥è¡¨ç”Ÿæˆç­‰åå°ä»»åŠ¡
     */
    @Bean("batchProcessingExecutor")
    public ThreadPoolTaskExecutor batchProcessingExecutor() {
        ThreadPoolTaskExecutor executor = new ThreadPoolTaskExecutor();
        
        executor.setCorePoolSize(2);                 // å°‘é‡æ ¸å¿ƒçº¿ç¨‹
        executor.setMaxPoolSize(5);                  // é™åˆ¶æœ€å¤§çº¿ç¨‹æ•°
        executor.setQueueCapacity(5000);             // å¤§é˜Ÿåˆ—ï¼Œå…è®¸ä»»åŠ¡å †ç§¯
        executor.setThreadNamePrefix("batch-process-");
        executor.setRejectedExecutionHandler(new ThreadPoolExecutor.DiscardOldestPolicy()); // ä¸¢å¼ƒæ—§ä»»åŠ¡
        
        executor.setKeepAliveSeconds(120);
        executor.initialize();
        
        monitorThreadPool(executor, "batch-process");
        
        return executor;
    }
    
    /**
     * IOå¯†é›†å‹çº¿ç¨‹æ± ï¼ˆæ›´å¤šçº¿ç¨‹ï¼‰
     * é€‚ç”¨åœºæ™¯ï¼šå¤–éƒ¨ç³»ç»Ÿè°ƒç”¨ã€æ–‡ä»¶æ“ä½œ
     */
    @Bean("ioIntensiveExecutor")
    public ThreadPoolTaskExecutor ioIntensiveExecutor() {
        ThreadPoolTaskExecutor executor = new ThreadPoolTaskExecutor();
        
        int cpuCores = Runtime.getRuntime().availableProcessors();
        
        executor.setCorePoolSize(cpuCores * 4);      // IOå¯†é›†å‹ï¼š4N
        executor.setMaxPoolSize(cpuCores * 8);       // æœ€å¤§8N
        executor.setQueueCapacity(2000);
        executor.setThreadNamePrefix("io-intensive-");
        executor.setRejectedExecutionHandler(new ThreadPoolExecutor.AbortPolicy()); // å¿«é€Ÿå¤±è´¥
        
        executor.initialize();
        
        monitorThreadPool(executor, "io-intensive");
        
        return executor;
    }
    
    /**
     * çº¿ç¨‹æ± ç›‘æ§
     */
    private void monitorThreadPool(ThreadPoolTaskExecutor executor, String poolName) {
        ThreadPoolExecutor pool = executor.getThreadPoolExecutor();
        
        // å®šæœŸé‡‡é›†æŒ‡æ ‡
        ScheduledExecutorService monitor = Executors.newSingleThreadScheduledExecutor();
        monitor.scheduleAtFixedRate(() -> {
            metricCollector.recordThreadPoolMetrics(
                poolName,
                pool.getPoolSize(),
                pool.getActiveCount(),
                pool.getQueue().size(),
                pool.getCompletedTaskCount(),
                pool.getLargestPoolSize()
            );
            
            // åŠ¨æ€è°ƒæ•´ï¼ˆåŸºäºè´Ÿè½½ï¼‰
            dynamicAdjustThreadPool(pool, poolName);
            
        }, 0, 30, TimeUnit.SECONDS); // æ¯30ç§’ç›‘æ§ä¸€æ¬¡
    }
    
    /**
     * åŠ¨æ€çº¿ç¨‹æ± è°ƒæ•´
     */
    private void dynamicAdjustThreadPool(ThreadPoolExecutor pool, String poolName) {
        int activeCount = pool.getActiveCount();
        int poolSize = pool.getPoolSize();
        int queueSize = pool.getQueue().size();
        
        // è´Ÿè½½è®¡ç®—
        double loadFactor = (double) activeCount / poolSize;
        
        // è‡ªåŠ¨æ‰©å®¹é€»è¾‘
        if (loadFactor > 0.8 && queueSize > 100) {
            // è´Ÿè½½é«˜ä¸”æœ‰ä»»åŠ¡å †ç§¯ï¼Œè€ƒè™‘æ‰©å®¹
            int newSize = Math.min(pool.getMaximumPoolSize(), poolSize * 2);
            if (newSize > poolSize) {
                pool.setCorePoolSize(newSize);
                log.info("çº¿ç¨‹æ± {}åŠ¨æ€æ‰©å®¹: {} -> {}", poolName, poolSize, newSize);
            }
        }
        
        // è‡ªåŠ¨ç¼©å®¹é€»è¾‘
        if (loadFactor < 0.3 && poolSize > pool.getCorePoolSize()) {
            // è´Ÿè½½ä½ï¼Œè€ƒè™‘ç¼©å®¹
            pool.setCorePoolSize(pool.getCorePoolSize());
            log.info("çº¿ç¨‹æ± {}åŠ¨æ€ç¼©å®¹: {} -> {}", poolName, poolSize, pool.getCorePoolSize());
        }
    }
}
```

```java
@Component
@Aspect
@Slf4j
public class PerformanceMonitorAspect {
    
    @Autowired
    private MetricCollector metricCollector;
    
    @Autowired
    private Tracer tracer;
    
    /**
     * æ–¹æ³•çº§æ€§èƒ½ç›‘æ§
     */
    @Around("@annotation(MonitorPerformance)")
    public Object monitorMethod(ProceedingJoinPoint joinPoint) throws Throwable {
        String className = joinPoint.getTarget().getClass().getSimpleName();
        String methodName = joinPoint.getSignature().getName();
        String fullMethodName = className + "." + methodName;
        
        long startTime = System.currentTimeMillis();
        boolean success = true;
        
        // åˆ›å»ºåˆ†å¸ƒå¼è¿½è¸ª
        Span span = tracer.buildSpan(fullMethodName).start();
        
        try (Scope scope = tracer.activateSpan(span)) {
            // æ·»åŠ æ ‡ç­¾
            span.setTag("class", className);
            span.setTag("method", methodName);
            span.setTag("args", Arrays.toString(joinPoint.getArgs()));
            
            // æ‰§è¡ŒåŸæ–¹æ³•
            Object result = joinPoint.proceed();
            
            // è®°å½•æˆåŠŸæŒ‡æ ‡
            metricCollector.recordSuccess(fullMethodName, result);
            
            return result;
            
        } catch (Exception e) {
            success = false;
            span.setTag("error", true);
            span.log(e.getMessage());
            
            // è®°å½•å¤±è´¥æŒ‡æ ‡
            metricCollector.recordFailure(fullMethodName, e);
            
            throw e;
        } finally {
            long duration = System.currentTimeMillis() - startTime;
            
            // è®°å½•æ€§èƒ½æŒ‡æ ‡
            metricCollector.recordLatency(fullMethodName, duration, success);
            
            // è®°å½•åˆ°è¿½è¸ª
            span.setTag("duration_ms", duration);
            span.setTag("success", success);
            span.finish();
            
            // æ…¢æ–¹æ³•å‘Šè­¦
            if (duration > getThreshold(fullMethodName)) {
                log.warn("æ…¢æ–¹æ³•æ£€æµ‹: {} è€—æ—¶ {}ms", fullMethodName, duration);
                alertSlowMethod(fullMethodName, duration);
            }
        }
    }
    
    /**
     * SQLæ€§èƒ½ç›‘æ§
     */
    @Around("execution(* org.springframework.jdbc.core.JdbcTemplate.*(..))")
    public Object monitorSql(ProceedingJoinPoint joinPoint) throws Throwable {
        String methodName = joinPoint.getSignature().getName();
        Object[] args = joinPoint.getArgs();
        
        String sql = null;
        if (args.length > 0 && args[0] instanceof String) {
            sql = (String) args[0];
        }
        
        long startTime = System.currentTimeMillis();
        boolean success = true;
        
        try {
            Object result = joinPoint.proceed();
            return result;
        } catch (Exception e) {
            success = false;
            throw e;
        } finally {
            long duration = System.currentTimeMillis() - startTime;
            
            // è®°å½•SQLæ€§èƒ½æŒ‡æ ‡
            if (sql != null) {
                metricCollector.recordSqlExecution(sql, duration, success);
                
                // æ…¢SQLæ£€æµ‹
                if (duration > 1000) { // è¶…è¿‡1ç§’ä¸ºæ…¢SQL
                    log.warn("æ…¢SQLæ£€æµ‹: {} è€—æ—¶ {}ms", abbreviateSql(sql), duration);
                    
                    // è§¦å‘æ…¢SQLåˆ†æ
                    CompletableFuture.runAsync(() -> {
                        analyzeSlowSql(sql, duration, args);
                    }, sqlAnalyzeExecutor);
                }
            }
        }
    }
}
```

```java
// JVMç›‘æ§ä¸è‡ªåŠ¨è°ƒä¼˜
@Component
@Slf4j
public class JvmMonitor {
    
    @Autowired
    private MetricCollector metricCollector;
    
    @Scheduled(fixedDelay = 30000) // æ¯30ç§’ç›‘æ§ä¸€æ¬¡
    public void monitorJvm() {
        // å†…å­˜ä½¿ç”¨æƒ…å†µ
        MemoryUsage heapUsage = ManagementFactory.getMemoryMXBean().getHeapMemoryUsage();
        MemoryUsage nonHeapUsage = ManagementFactory.getMemoryMXBean().getNonHeapMemoryUsage();
        
        metricCollector.recordMemoryUsage(
            heapUsage.getUsed(),
            heapUsage.getMax(),
            nonHeapUsage.getUsed(),
            nonHeapUsage.getMax()
        );
        
        // GCæƒ…å†µ
        List<GarbageCollectorMXBean> gcBeans = ManagementFactory.getGarbageCollectorMXBeans();
        for (GarbageCollectorMXBean gc : gcBeans) {
            metricCollector.recordGcStats(
                gc.getName(),
                gc.getCollectionCount(),
                gc.getCollectionTime()
            );
            
            // GCé¢‘ç‡å¼‚å¸¸æ£€æµ‹
            if (isGcTooFrequent(gc)) {
                log.warn("GCè¿‡äºé¢‘ç¹: {} - {}æ¬¡/åˆ†é’Ÿ", gc.getName(), getGcFrequencyPerMinute(gc));
                alertGcProblem(gc);
            }
        }
        
        // çº¿ç¨‹æƒ…å†µ
        ThreadMXBean threadBean = ManagementFactory.getThreadMXBean();
        metricCollector.recordThreadStats(
            threadBean.getThreadCount(),
            threadBean.getPeakThreadCount(),
            threadBean.getDaemonThreadCount()
        );
        
        // è‡ªåŠ¨å†…å­˜è°ƒä¼˜å»ºè®®
        provideMemoryTuningAdvice(heapUsage, nonHeapUsage);
    }
    
    /**
     * å†…å­˜è°ƒä¼˜å»ºè®®
     */
    private void provideMemoryTuningAdvice(MemoryUsage heapUsage, MemoryUsage nonHeapUsage) {
        double heapUsageRatio = (double) heapUsage.getUsed() / heapUsage.getMax();
        double nonHeapUsageRatio = (double) nonHeapUsage.getUsed() / nonHeapUsage.getMax();
        
        if (heapUsageRatio > 0.8) {
            log.warn("å †å†…å­˜ä½¿ç”¨ç‡è¿‡é«˜: {}%ï¼Œå»ºè®®å¢åŠ å †å†…å­˜æˆ–ä¼˜åŒ–å†…å­˜ä½¿ç”¨", heapUsageRatio * 100);
            
            // åˆ†æå†…å­˜å ç”¨
            analyzeMemoryUsage();
        }
        
        if (nonHeapUsageRatio > 0.9) {
            log.warn("éå †å†…å­˜ä½¿ç”¨ç‡è¿‡é«˜: {}%ï¼Œå»ºè®®å¢åŠ Metaspaceå¤§å°", nonHeapUsageRatio * 100);
        }
    }
    
    /**
     * å†…å­˜åˆ†æï¼ˆä½¿ç”¨jmapç”Ÿæˆå †è½¬å‚¨åˆ†æï¼‰
     */
    private void analyzeMemoryUsage() {
        try {
            // ç”Ÿæˆå †è½¬å‚¨ï¼ˆç”Ÿäº§ç¯å¢ƒæ…ç”¨ï¼‰
            if (shouldGenerateHeapDump()) {
                String dumpFile = "/tmp/heapdump_" + System.currentTimeMillis() + ".hprof";
                HotSpotDiagnosticMXBean diagnostic = ManagementFactory
                    .getPlatformMXBean(HotSpotDiagnosticMXBean.class);
                diagnostic.dumpHeap(dumpFile, true);
                
                log.info("å·²ç”Ÿæˆå †è½¬å‚¨æ–‡ä»¶: {}", dumpFile);
                
                // å¼‚æ­¥åˆ†æå †è½¬å‚¨
                CompletableFuture.runAsync(() -> {
                    analyzeHeapDump(dumpFile);
                }, heapAnalyzeExecutor);
            }
        } catch (Exception e) {
            log.error("ç”Ÿæˆå †è½¬å‚¨å¤±è´¥", e);
        }
    }
}
```

###### 3.1 è¯„ä¼°å¼•æ“ä¸»æµç¨‹

```java
@Service
@Slf4j
@Transactional
public class SupplierEvaluationEngine {
    
    @Autowired
    private EvaluationTemplateRepository templateRepository;
    
    @Autowired
    private DataCollectorFactory dataCollectorFactory;
    
    @Autowired
    private RuleCalculatorFactory ruleCalculatorFactory;
    
    @Autowired
    private ResultProcessor resultProcessor;
    
    @Autowired
    private ThreadPoolTaskExecutor evaluationExecutor;
    
    @Autowired
    private MetricRegistry metricRegistry;
    
    /**
     * æ‰§è¡Œä¾›åº”å•†è¯„ä¼° - ä¸»å…¥å£
     */
    public EvaluationResult evaluate(Long supplierId, String templateCode, 
                                   EvaluationContext context) {
        Timer.Sample timer = Timer.start();
        
        try {
            // 1. å‡†å¤‡é˜¶æ®µ
            EvaluationContext evaluationContext = prepareContext(supplierId, templateCode, context);
            
            // 2. æ•°æ®é‡‡é›†é˜¶æ®µ
            Map<String, IndicatorData> indicatorDataMap = collectData(evaluationContext);
            
            // 3. è®¡ç®—è¯„åˆ†é˜¶æ®µ
            Map<String, IndicatorScore> indicatorScores = calculateScores(evaluationContext, indicatorDataMap);
            
            // 4. ç»¼åˆå¤„ç†é˜¶æ®µ
            EvaluationResult result = processResult(evaluationContext, indicatorScores);
            
            // 5. æŒä¹…åŒ–å’Œåå¤„ç†
            persistAndPostProcess(result);
            
            return result;
            
        } catch (Exception e) {
            metricRegistry.counter("evaluation.failure").increment();
            log.error("ä¾›åº”å•†è¯„ä¼°å¤±è´¥ï¼ŒsupplierId: {}, templateCode: {}", 
                     supplierId, templateCode, e);
            throw new EvaluationException("è¯„ä¼°æ‰§è¡Œå¤±è´¥", e);
        } finally {
            timer.stop(metricRegistry.timer("evaluation.duration"));
        }
    }
    
    /**
     * å‡†å¤‡è¯„ä¼°ä¸Šä¸‹æ–‡
     */
    private EvaluationContext prepareContext(Long supplierId, String templateCode, 
                                           EvaluationContext inputContext) {
        Timer.Sample timer = Timer.start();
        
        try {
            // 1. åŠ è½½è¯„ä¼°æ¨¡æ¿
            EvaluationTemplate template = templateRepository.findByCode(templateCode)
                .orElseThrow(() -> new TemplateNotFoundException(templateCode));
            
            // 2. è§£ææ¨¡æ¿é…ç½®
            EvaluationConfig config = parseTemplateConfig(template);
            
            // 3. æ„å»ºè¯„ä¼°ä¸Šä¸‹æ–‡
            EvaluationContext context = EvaluationContext.builder()
                .evaluationNo(generateEvaluationNo())
                .supplierId(supplierId)
                .template(template)
                .config(config)
                .evaluationDate(LocalDate.now())
                .evaluatorId(inputContext.getEvaluatorId())
                .build();
            
            // 4. éªŒè¯è¯„ä¼°æ¡ä»¶
            validateEvaluationCondition(context);
            
            return context;
            
        } finally {
            timer.stop(metricRegistry.timer("evaluation.prepare"));
        }
    }
    
    /**
     * å¹¶è¡Œæ•°æ®é‡‡é›†
     */
    private Map<String, IndicatorData> collectData(EvaluationContext context) {
        Timer.Sample timer = Timer.start();
        
        try {
            EvaluationConfig config = context.getConfig();
            
            // ä½¿ç”¨CompletableFutureå¹¶è¡Œé‡‡é›†æ¯ä¸ªæŒ‡æ ‡çš„æ•°æ®
            List<CompletableFuture<IndicatorData>> futures = config.getIndicators().stream()
                .map(indicator -> CompletableFuture.supplyAsync(() -> {
                    Timer.Sample indicatorTimer = Timer.start();
                    try {
                        // è·å–å¯¹åº”çš„æ•°æ®é‡‡é›†å™¨
                        DataCollector collector = dataCollectorFactory.getCollector(
                            indicator.getDataSource().getType());
                        
                        // é‡‡é›†æ•°æ®
                        IndicatorData data = collector.collect(context, indicator);
                        
                        metricRegistry.counter("indicator.data.collected",
                            "indicator", indicator.getCode()).increment();
                        
                        return data;
                        
                    } catch (Exception e) {
                        log.warn("æŒ‡æ ‡æ•°æ®é‡‡é›†å¤±è´¥: {}", indicator.getCode(), e);
                        metricRegistry.counter("indicator.data.failure",
                            "indicator", indicator.getCode()).increment();
                        
                        // è¿”å›é»˜è®¤å€¼æˆ–å¼‚å¸¸æ•°æ®
                        return IndicatorData.error(indicator, e);
                    } finally {
                        indicatorTimer.stop(metricRegistry.timer("indicator.collect.duration",
                            "indicator", indicator.getCode()));
                    }
                }, evaluationExecutor))
                .collect(Collectors.toList());
            
            // ç­‰å¾…æ‰€æœ‰æ•°æ®é‡‡é›†å®Œæˆï¼ˆè®¾ç½®è¶…æ—¶ï¼‰
            CompletableFuture.allOf(futures.toArray(new CompletableFuture[0]))
                .orTimeout(30, TimeUnit.SECONDS)
                .join();
            
            // èšåˆç»“æœ
            Map<String, IndicatorData> resultMap = new HashMap<>();
            for (CompletableFuture<IndicatorData> future : futures) {
                if (future.isDone() && !future.isCompletedExceptionally()) {
                    try {
                        IndicatorData data = future.get();
                        resultMap.put(data.getIndicatorCode(), data);
                    } catch (Exception e) {
                        log.warn("è·å–æŒ‡æ ‡æ•°æ®ç»“æœå¼‚å¸¸", e);
                    }
                }
            }
            
            return resultMap;
            
        } finally {
            timer.stop(metricRegistry.timer("evaluation.collect"));
        }
    }
    
    /**
     * è®¡ç®—æŒ‡æ ‡åˆ†æ•°
     */
    private Map<String, IndicatorScore> calculateScores(EvaluationContext context,
                                                      Map<String, IndicatorData> indicatorDataMap) {
        Timer.Sample timer = Timer.start();
        
        try {
            Map<String, IndicatorScore> result = new HashMap<>();
            
            for (Indicator indicator : context.getConfig().getIndicators()) {
                String indicatorCode = indicator.getCode();
                IndicatorData data = indicatorDataMap.get(indicatorCode);
                
                if (data == null || data.isError()) {
                    // æ•°æ®ç¼ºå¤±æˆ–é”™è¯¯ï¼Œä½¿ç”¨é»˜è®¤åˆ†æ•°
                    result.put(indicatorCode, IndicatorScore.defaultScore(indicator));
                    continue;
                }
                
                try {
                    // è·å–å¯¹åº”çš„è§„åˆ™è®¡ç®—å™¨
                    RuleCalculator calculator = ruleCalculatorFactory.getCalculator(
                        indicator.getCalculationRule().getType());
                    
                    // è®¡ç®—åˆ†æ•°
                    IndicatorScore score = calculator.calculate(indicator, data);
                    result.put(indicatorCode, score);
                    
                } catch (Exception e) {
                    log.warn("æŒ‡æ ‡åˆ†æ•°è®¡ç®—å¤±è´¥: {}", indicatorCode, e);
                    result.put(indicatorCode, IndicatorScore.defaultScore(indicator));
                }
            }
            
            return result;
            
        } finally {
            timer.stop(metricRegistry.timer("evaluation.calculate"));
        }
    }
    
    /**
     * å¤„ç†ç»¼åˆç»“æœ
     */
    private EvaluationResult processResult(EvaluationContext context,
                                         Map<String, IndicatorScore> indicatorScores) {
        Timer.Sample timer = Timer.start();
        
        try {
            // 1. è®¡ç®—æ€»åˆ†
            BigDecimal totalScore = calculateTotalScore(context.getConfig(), indicatorScores);
            
            // 2. åº”ç”¨ç‰¹æ®Šè§„åˆ™è°ƒæ•´
            totalScore = applySpecialRules(context, indicatorScores, totalScore);
            
            // 3. ç¡®å®šç­‰çº§
            String level = determineLevel(context.getConfig(), totalScore);
            
            // 4. åº”ç”¨ç­‰çº§é™åˆ¶è§„åˆ™
            level = applyLevelCappingRules(context, indicatorScores, level);
            
            // 5. æ„å»ºç»“æœ
            EvaluationResult result = EvaluationResult.builder()
                .evaluationNo(context.getEvaluationNo())
                .supplierId(context.getSupplierId())
                .templateCode(context.getTemplate().getTemplateCode())
                .evaluationDate(context.getEvaluationDate())
                .totalScore(totalScore)
                .evaluationLevel(level)
                .indicatorScores(indicatorScores)
                .evaluatorId(context.getEvaluatorId())
                .build();
            
            return result;
            
        } finally {
            timer.stop(metricRegistry.timer("evaluation.process"));
        }
    }
    
    /**
     * è®¡ç®—æ€»åˆ†
     */
    private BigDecimal calculateTotalScore(EvaluationConfig config,
                                         Map<String, IndicatorScore> indicatorScores) {
        BigDecimal total = BigDecimal.ZERO;
        
        for (Indicator indicator : config.getIndicators()) {
            IndicatorScore score = indicatorScores.get(indicator.getCode());
            if (score != null) {
                BigDecimal weightedScore = score.getScore()
                    .multiply(indicator.getWeight())
                    .setScale(2, RoundingMode.HALF_UP);
                total = total.add(weightedScore);
            }
        }
        
        return total.setScale(2, RoundingMode.HALF_UP);
    }
    
    /**
     * ç¡®å®šç­‰çº§
     */
    private String determineLevel(EvaluationConfig config, BigDecimal totalScore) {
        for (LevelSetting level : config.getLevelConfig().getLevels()) {
            boolean minCondition = level.getMinScore() == null || 
                                  totalScore.compareTo(level.getMinScore()) >= 0;
            boolean maxCondition = level.getMaxScore() == null || 
                                  totalScore.compareTo(level.getMaxScore()) < 0;
            
            if (minCondition && maxCondition) {
                return level.getLevel();
            }
        }
        
        return "D"; // é»˜è®¤è¿”å›æœ€ä½ç­‰çº§
    }
}
```

###### 3.2 æ•°æ®é‡‡é›†å™¨å®ç°

```java
@Component
@Slf4j
public class MultiSourceDataCollector implements DataCollector {
    
    @Autowired
    private RestTemplate restTemplate;
    
    @Autowired
    private SupplierRepository supplierRepository;
    
    @Autowired
    private QualityServiceClient qualityServiceClient;
    
    @Autowired
    private DeliveryServiceClient deliveryServiceClient;
    
    @Autowired
    private FinancialServiceClient financialServiceClient;
    
    @Override
    public IndicatorData collect(EvaluationContext context, Indicator indicator) {
        DataSourceConfig dataSource = indicator.getDataSource();
        
        switch (dataSource.getType()) {
            case API:
                return collectFromApi(context, indicator, dataSource);
                
            case DATABASE:
                return collectFromDatabase(context, indicator, dataSource);
                
            case SERVICE:
                return collectFromService(context, indicator, dataSource);
                
            case MANUAL_INPUT:
                return collectManualInput(context, indicator, dataSource);
                
            case CALCULATED:
                return calculateValue(context, indicator, dataSource);
                
            default:
                throw new UnsupportedDataSourceException(dataSource.getType());
        }
    }
    
    /**
     * ä»APIæ¥å£é‡‡é›†æ•°æ®
     */
    private IndicatorData collectFromApi(EvaluationContext context, Indicator indicator,
                                       DataSourceConfig dataSource) {
        try {
            // æ„å»ºè¯·æ±‚å‚æ•°
            Map<String, Object> params = resolveParameters(context, dataSource.getParams());
            
            // æ‰§è¡ŒHTTPè¯·æ±‚
            ResponseEntity<Map> response = restTemplate.exchange(
                dataSource.getEndpoint(),
                HttpMethod.valueOf(dataSource.getMethod()),
                new HttpEntity<>(buildHeaders(dataSource)),
                Map.class,
                params
            );
            
            if (response.getStatusCode().is2xxSuccessful() && response.getBody() != null) {
                // ä»å“åº”ä¸­æå–æ•°æ®
                Object rawValue = extractValueFromResponse(response.getBody(), 
                                                         dataSource.getResponseMapping());
                
                // è½¬æ¢ä¸ºæ ‡å‡†æ ¼å¼
                Object standardizedValue = standardizeValue(rawValue, 
                                                          dataSource.getResponseMapping().getDataType());
                
                return IndicatorData.success(indicator.getCode(), standardizedValue);
            } else {
                return IndicatorData.error(indicator.getCode(), 
                    new DataCollectionException("APIè¯·æ±‚å¤±è´¥: " + response.getStatusCode()));
            }
            
        } catch (Exception e) {
            log.error("APIæ•°æ®é‡‡é›†å¤±è´¥: {}", dataSource.getEndpoint(), e);
            return IndicatorData.error(indicator.getCode(), e);
        }
    }
    
    /**
     * ä»æ•°æ®åº“é‡‡é›†æ•°æ®
     */
    private IndicatorData collectFromDatabase(EvaluationContext context, Indicator indicator,
                                            DataSourceConfig dataSource) {
        try {
            String sql = dataSource.getQuery();
            Map<String, Object> params = resolveParameters(context, dataSource.getParams());
            
            // ä½¿ç”¨JdbcTemplateæ‰§è¡ŒæŸ¥è¯¢
            List<Map<String, Object>> results = jdbcTemplate.queryForList(sql, params);
            
            if (!results.isEmpty()) {
                Map<String, Object> firstRow = results.get(0);
                Object rawValue = extractValueFromRow(firstRow, dataSource.getFieldMapping());
                Object standardizedValue = standardizeValue(rawValue, dataSource.getDataType());
                
                return IndicatorData.success(indicator.getCode(), standardizedValue);
            } else {
                return IndicatorData.missing(indicator.getCode(), "æ•°æ®åº“æŸ¥è¯¢æ— ç»“æœ");
            }
            
        } catch (Exception e) {
            log.error("æ•°æ®åº“æ•°æ®é‡‡é›†å¤±è´¥", e);
            return IndicatorData.error(indicator.getCode(), e);
        }
    }
    
    /**
     * ä»å¾®æœåŠ¡é‡‡é›†æ•°æ®
     */
    private IndicatorData collectFromService(EvaluationContext context, Indicator indicator,
                                           DataSourceConfig dataSource) {
        try {
            Long supplierId = context.getSupplierId();
            LocalDate evaluationDate = context.getEvaluationDate();
            
            // æ ¹æ®æ•°æ®æºç±»å‹è°ƒç”¨ä¸åŒçš„æœåŠ¡
            switch (dataSource.getServiceType()) {
                case QUALITY:
                    QualityStats qualityStats = qualityServiceClient.getQualityStats(
                        supplierId, evaluationDate.minusDays(90), evaluationDate);
                    return IndicatorData.success(indicator.getCode(), qualityStats.getQualifiedRate());
                    
                case DELIVERY:
                    DeliveryPerformance deliveryPerf = deliveryServiceClient.getDeliveryPerformance(
                        supplierId, evaluationDate.minusDays(180), evaluationDate);
                    return IndicatorData.success(indicator.getCode(), deliveryPerf.getOnTimeRate());
                    
                case FINANCIAL:
                    FinancialStatus financialStatus = financialServiceClient.getFinancialStatus(supplierId);
                    return IndicatorData.success(indicator.getCode(), financialStatus.getProfitMargin());
                    
                default:
                    return IndicatorData.error(indicator.getCode(), 
                        new UnsupportedServiceException(dataSource.getServiceType()));
            }
            
        } catch (Exception e) {
            log.error("æœåŠ¡æ•°æ®é‡‡é›†å¤±è´¥", e);
            return IndicatorData.error(indicator.getCode(), e);
        }
    }
    
    /**
     * è§£æå‚æ•°ï¼ˆæ”¯æŒè¡¨è¾¾å¼ï¼‰
     */
    private Map<String, Object> resolveParameters(EvaluationContext context, 
                                                Map<String, Object> paramConfig) {
        Map<String, Object> resolved = new HashMap<>();
        
        for (Map.Entry<String, Object> entry : paramConfig.entrySet()) {
            Object value = entry.getValue();
            
            if (value instanceof String) {
                String strValue = (String) value;
                
                // æ”¯æŒè¡¨è¾¾å¼ï¼š${supplierId}, ${evaluationDate-90d}
                if (strValue.startsWith("${") && strValue.endsWith("}")) {
                    String expression = strValue.substring(2, strValue.length() - 1);
                    resolved.put(entry.getKey(), evaluateExpression(context, expression));
                } else {
                    resolved.put(entry.getKey(), value);
                }
            } else {
                resolved.put(entry.getKey(), value);
            }
        }
        
        return resolved;
    }
}
```
